https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/DMc4eRfU0RA2SX2oGR3YllEhH7.jpg Paris-based wine expert Steven Spurrier heads to California in search of cheap wine that he can use for a blind taste test in the French capital. Stumbling upon the Napa Valley, the stuck-up Englishman is shocked to discover a winery turning out top-notch chardonnay. Determined to make a name for himself, he sets about getting the booze back to Paris. Bottle Shock
